inclusion.criterion: platelet count below one hundred and fifty thousands unit/liter
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Newborns have platelet count one hundred and fifty thousands unit/liter
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
